0.1.name: wordpress/easy-webradio-gratis-player
0.1.description:
It is time for you to easily insert a radio in your wordpress, the webradiogratis.com provides free hosting of your radio, with server and shoutcast icecast.

You create a free web radio, play your music and with this plugin you transmit to your web.
